query:
SELECT d.id, d.slug, d.name, ps.primaryColor, ps.secondaryColor, ps.contrastColor, ps.showMap, ps.showTeam, ps.showComments 
FROM documents d 
LEFT JOIN proposal_settings ps ON d.id = ps.documentId 
WHERE d.slug IN ('default', 'busplan_2026_01', 'capstat-gen');
command:
